key_takeaways: Solution: Create on-chain equivalent games that are just as fun but provide actual value to players (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Make DAO participation invisible through superior UX (Channel: community)
Strategy: Play-to-earn model where users earn value instead of being harvested
Strategy: Focus on user experience over branding in DAO participation
Startup Opportunity: On-chain gaming platform that replaces traditional mobile games (Target: current mobile game players, especially casual gam)
